title: Did a California Public School District ‘Teach Pedophilia as a Sexual Orientation’?
subtitle: A Christian conservative website and a group of activists in California responded with outrage to a classroom presentation's reference to the Ancient Greek custom of pederasty.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2018 or 2019, Brea Olinda Unified School District in California "taught pedophilia as a sexual orientation."
